resources.string: Already have an account? SIGN IN
" You are about to delete your account. Are you sure you want to delete your account? "

Buy4All is a marketplace app where you can buy and sell products and services easily. Whether you\'re looking for electronics, fashion, services, or more, Buy4All connects you with trusted users to make your transactions smooth and secure.
We‚Äôve sent you a link to verify your email address. Please open it to continue using the app.

The ad posting rules on Buy4All are designed to ensure the high quality of listings and seamless interaction between buyers and sellers. By using the features and services provided by the Buy4All website, users agree to accept and adhere to these Ad Posting Rules. If violations are recorded, the related ads will be removed, and the respective accounts may be blocked. 1. Posting the same or similar ads multiple times in one or more sections is not allowed. 2. Each ad must be placed in the most appropriate category. 2.1. Ads should be placed in the section that corresponds to their content. 2.2. Ads offering services must only be posted in the (Services) section. 3. Before posting an ad, remember: 3.1. The ad should provide as much detailed information as possible about the product/service being offered or sought. 3.2. All ad attributes (e.g., price, area, model, salary, etc.) must reflect reality. The title must accurately represent the ad content. 3.3. The title must not contain contact information such as phone numbers, addresses, email addresses, or prices. 3.4. The description must not include any contact information, as there are dedicated fields for such details. 3.5. Photos must correspond to the title and description of the product/service. The photo must clearly show the offered product and must not contain logos, brand names, URLs, company names, prices, text, graphic decorations, or any other promotional or contact details. Attention-grabbing inscriptions like ‚ÄúUrgent,‚Äù ‚ÄúAttention,‚Äù ‚ÄúPromo,‚Äù ‚ÄúDiscount,‚Äù etc., are prohibited. 3.6. Each ad must represent only one item, service, or job vacancy. If offering more than one, please post separate ads. 3.7. Each user may have only one registered account. Posting duplicate ads using different emails for the same person or organization is not allowed. 3.8. Ads must be written in the alphabet of the language being used. For example, Armenian words must be written using Armenian letters. The use of transliteration is unacceptable. 4. Any actions intended to manipulate or disrupt the normal operation of the site are strictly prohibited, including: 4.1. Stuffing the title or description with keywords to mislead search algorithms. 4.2. Writing phone numbers with letters or symbols to bypass filters. 4.3. Deleting and reposting the same ad to appear fresh (use the refresh feature instead). 4.4. Using multiple emails and phone numbers to mislead customers or the platform. 4.5. Posting non-existent items, vehicles, real estate, or job offers. 4.6. Changing the content of an existing ad to offer a different product, service, or job. Inactive ads must be removed. 5. Special rules for real estate agencies, job placement agencies, employers, and dealers: 5.1. Intermediaries or businesses may not select the (Owner) option when posting. They must clearly provide the organization‚Äôs name and physical address. 5.2. Real estate and job placement agencies must use a single account for all employees. Duplicate postings using both agency and individual accounts are not allowed. 5.3. Real estate agents must have the property owner\'s permission to post listings. Buy4All reserves the right to request documentation and deny ad publication. 5.4. Agencies must remove listings once the property is sold, rented, or no longer available. 5.5. Job listings must include detailed descriptions with at least three sections: requirements, responsibilities, and working conditions. 6. Ads containing the following are prohibited: 6.1. Offers of illegal products or services. 6.2. Offensive or disrespectful language, including racist or religious slurs. 6.3. Sales of online accounts, passwords, third-party data, or related services. 6.4. Erotic services, prostitution, pornography, including photos with explicit content. 6.5. Fraud, extortion, requests/offers for financial aid, or content using phrases like ‚Äúlooking for a sponsor,‚Äù ‚Äúoffering financial support,‚Äù etc. 6.6. Job offers involving nightclubs, webcam models, exotic dancers, and similar work. 6.7. Sales or exchange of drugs, medications, tobacco products, vapes, vape liquids, or tobacco mixtures. 6.8. Job offers abroad (including Russia) or offers to earn money online. 6.9. Occult-themed offers like fortune-telling, satanism, rituals, magic, psychics, etc. 6.10. Discrimination based on nationality, race, religion, or gender. 6.11. Network marketing product sales, related services, or job offers. 6.12. Suspicious financial service offers, investment schemes, or phrases like ‚Äúloan in one hour with no collateral or guarantee.‚Äù 7. Job offers are not allowed if they include: 7.1. Franchises, pyramids, MLMs, ‚Äúclub memberships,‚Äù or distributor agreements. 7.2. Agencies requiring upfront or ongoing payments, or recruitment of new agents. 7.3. Commission-only jobs or offers to ‚Äúwork from home.‚Äù 8. Ads solely intended to promote other websites are not allowed. External links are prohibited. 9. Fake ads or false information involving third parties are strictly prohibited. According to the Terms of Use, Buy4All reserves the right to remove any ad without explanation if it does not comply with the posting rules. Buy4All administrators and moderators are authorized to edit ad text, move ads to appropriate sections, limit the number of ads per user, or completely ban ad posting. Users who deliberately violate these rules will be banned long-term.

General Overview At Buy4All, protecting your personal data privacy is important to us. That‚Äôs why we are committed to safeguarding the personal information of all visitors and users of our website and mobile application (‚ÄúServices‚Äù). Through this Privacy Policy (‚ÄúPrivacy Policy‚Äù), we explain how we collect your data, why we need it, and how we use it. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully, as it contains important information about how we process any personal data you provide to us. The Information We Collect and How We Use It We only collect the information necessary for: Providing and improving our services: We use your data to enhance our Services and tailor them to your preferences. This is essential for us to understand how our Services are used lawfully and to find and implement ways to grow and develop our business. It also enables us to pursue our legitimate interests in improving our Services, increasing their efficiency and user engagement, and gaining insights into usage patterns. At Buy4All, it is vital for us to adapt to your individual needs in order to assist you in finding relevant information, products, and services, including helping sellers market and sell their products effectively. Sending you updates about improvements and new services: To inform you about new products, services, and promotions, and to provide you with content we believe may be of interest, we may send you messages and materials directly via email or other means. Ensuring the security and safety of our services: We use your data for safety and security purposes, which may include sharing it when necessary. This is done to ensure the security of our Services, prevent harm to individuals or property, prevent crimes, enforce or protect legal rights, and defend against damage to our systems or users or protect the legitimate interests of third parties. This includes protecting our community from spam, fraud, abuse, intellectual property violations, crimes, and all types of security risks. We use your data to deliver and improve our Services, process payments and invoices, verify your identity, and generate reports and summaries for analytical purposes. Data We Collect About You When you use the Services or create login credentials, you may be asked to provide information about yourself, including: (i) Your name and contact details such as email address and phone number; (ii) Information that helps us verify your identity; (iii) Location data; (iv) Data required for invoicing and payment processing; (v) Other data we may require from time to time to provide Services and comply with legal obligations. This information is essential for us to provide you with our Services. Failure to provide such data may result in delays or inability to provide the Services. Who We Share Your Personal Data With We may share all or part of the above-mentioned data in the following cases: Under a search warrant, court order, or other legal obligation; To protect the rights, property, or safety of Buy4All users, Buy4All itself, or the general public; At your request (e.g., if you authorize us to share data with other users). Data We Retain and Process We may retain your data as necessary to facilitate use of the Services, personalize your experience, prevent fraud and abuse, or as required by law. This may include your name, address, email address, phone number, and purchase history. While we make every effort to store your data securely, we cannot guarantee its absolute safety. You can access and update certain data through your account login. Cookies When using our Services, we may send small files to your device (‚ÄúCookies‚Äù) to recognize it, monitor behavior on our website, and identify interest areas to tailor our Services to your preferences. We may collect and store personal data through Cookies and link them to personal information you have provided. You can configure your browser to reject Cookies, but this may restrict access to certain features. Security Measures We implement security policies, rules, and technical measures to protect personal data under our control from unauthorized access, misuse, disclosure, destruction, or accidental loss. We have procedures in place to deal with suspected data breaches. We will notify you and the appropriate regulatory authority if required by law. However, you are solely responsible for keeping your password and account details confidential. Ultimately, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and personal information. Always be cautious with your data. We are not responsible for and cannot control how others use the information you provide them. You should be careful about what personal information you share with others through the Services. Additionally, we are not responsible for the accuracy of personal or other information received through the Services from other users. You release us from liability related to the content of any such information. If you have concerns or suspect unauthorized use of your account or password, please contact us immediately. We may deactivate or suspend your account at any time. Data Deletion We reserve the right to delete and destroy all data collected about you after your account is deactivated, unless you request otherwise. You have the right to request deletion of your data. Depending on the Services we provided, we may be legally required to retain some data for up to five years after a deletion request. We cannot continue providing Services if you request data deletion. You can request data deletion by contacting our customer service or through the ‚ÄúAccount‚Äù section under ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù in Buy4All. Policy Updates We reserve the right to change this policy from time to time. Updated policies will be posted on our website, and by continuing to access and use our Services after changes are made, you agree to be bound by the updated policy.
